entry.title: 2024w25a-beta
entry.summary: - 🔥 Added the support for Chart Director;
entry.content:
• 🔥 Added the support for Chart Director;
  • ✔️ Fixed the necessity to run PSP-UFU in admin mode to change language;
  • 🐛 Minor bugfixes.

entry.title: 2024w23a-beta
entry.summary: - 🔥 Removed the OpenGL dependency and related errors;
entry.content:
• 🔥 Removed the OpenGL dependency and related errors;
  • 🔥 Added undo and redo feature (finally!);
  • ✔️ Voltage map upgraded due to OpenGL dependency removal;
  • ✔️ New feature to add a new text element via context menu;
  • ✔️ Selection and move elements improved;
  • ✔️ Code documentation updated (check here);
  • 🐛 Fixed a massive memory leak when using Synchronous Generator controls;
  • 🐛 Fixed simulation problems related to disconnected buses;
  • 🐛 Minor bugfixes.

entry.title: 2023w38a-beta
entry.summary: - 🔥 Added harmonic voltages and currents calculation;
entry.content:
• 🔥 Added harmonic voltages and currents calculation;
  • ✔️ Added harmonic results in data form;
  • 🐛 Fix program close suddenly on delete bus;
  • 🐛 Fix problems related to disconnected buses;
  • 🐛 Minor bugfixes.

entry.title: 2020w31a-beta
entry.summary: - 🔥 PSP-UFU online user guide finally written (only in Brazilian Portuguese, if you want to help me translate this guide, contact-me on GitHub or Twitter);
entry.content:
• 🔥 PSP-UFU online user guide finally written (only in Brazilian Portuguese, if you want to help me translate this guide, contact-me on GitHub or Twitter);
  • ✔️ New fancy PSP-UFU website and changelog using docusaurus;
  • ✔️ Text element performance improved for OpenGL render;
  • 🐛 Several major and minor bug fixes.

entry.title: 2020w28a-beta
entry.content:
• 🔥 Voltage heatmap implemented (OpenGL enabled);
  • 🐛 Several major and minor bugfixes.

entry.title: 2020w24a-beta
entry.summary: - ✔️ Device context render implemented (to avoid use OpenGL - some machines can't use it properly);
entry.content:
• ✔️ Device context render implemented (to avoid use OpenGL - some machines can't use it properly);
  • ✔️ Added Visual Studio solution to the GitHub project;
  • 🐛 Several major and minor bugfixes.

entry.title: 22019w44a-beta
entry.summary: - ✔️ Minor changes to 32bit MSW version for compatibility;
entry.content:
• ✔️ Minor changes to 32bit MSW version for compatibility;
  • ✔️ Travis CI (Continuous Integration) implemented (Linux).

entry.title: 2019w42a-beta
entry.content:
• 🔥 Harmonic study implemented;
  • 🔥 Autolayout from importation implemented;
  • 🔥 Importation of Matpower files;
  • 🐛 Several minor bugfixes.
